description: Detects suspicious outbound network activity via kerberos default port indicating possible lateral movement or first stage PrivEsc via delegation.
author: Ilyas Ochkov
oscd.community
name: Suspicious Outbound Kerberos Connection - Security
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"5156" AND DestPort:"88") AND (NOT Application:("C:\Windows\System32\lsass.exe" OR "C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe" OR "C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe" OR "C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" OR "C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe")))
